entry.title: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT, Lanaudière
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:10 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low zero with patchy frost.
